mapper.select: SELECT mdl.`name` as model_name, mdl.category_name as category_name, cast(m.`level` as char) as `level`, p.process_code FROM production_feature pf JOIN material m ON m.material_id = pf.material_id JOIN v_model mdl ON m.model_id = mdl.model_id JOIN position p ON p.position_id = pf.position_id WHERE pf.action_time is NOT NULL AND pf.finish_time is NULL AND operate_result not in (5, 7) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT(1) FROM alarm_messsage WHERE material_id = pf.material_id AND position_id = pf.position_id AND reason = 2 );
SELECT count(1) FROM production_feature pf WHERE pf.action_time is NOT NULL AND pf.finish_time between #{start_date} AND #{end_date};

SELECT model_id, serial_no, op.job_no FROM production_feature pf JOIN material ma ON pf.material_id = ma.material_id JOIN operator op ON pf.operator_id = op.operator_id JOIN position pos ON pf.position_id = pos.position_id WHERE pf.operate_result = 2 AND ma.model_id = #{model_id} AND pf.finish_time between #{package_date} AND date_add(#{package_date}, interval 1 day) AND pos.special_page = 'shipping' ORDER BY pf.finish_time ;
